<title>Powered by L-Soft's LISTSERV mailing list manager</title>     <link>http://www.lsoft.com/products/listserv-powered.asp</link>     <url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;229164eb.1501">   <title>Education&Culture conference Timisoara </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;229164eb.1501</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Due to increasing demand, the deadline for abstract submission for the<br>*International<br>Conference Beliefs and Behaviours in Education and Culture* (West<br>University of Timi\ufffd\ufffdoara, Romania, 25-27 June 2015) has been extended to *20<br>February 2015*.<br><br>The aim of the conference, proposing interdisciplinary perspectives, is to<br>build comprehensive and holistic explanations of beliefs from different<br>sciences that have a great impact upon education and culture. The<br>conference addresses themes related to issues and processes of education at<br>any level, from kindergarten to lifelong learning, from formal to informal<br>education. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-14T15:41:03+02:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>monica oprescu</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;229164eb.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;7441b7df.1412">   <title>CfP: Gender and Education: Critical Issues, Policy and Practice 28-30 May 2015, Bloomington, IN, United States </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;7441b7df.1412</link>   <description> Apologies for any cross-posting. Please circulate widely.<br><br>International Conference on<br>Gender and Education<br>Critical Issues, Policy and Practice<br>28-30 May 2015, Bloomington, IN, United States<br><br>Organising Institutions:<br>Gender Studies Platform, London Centre for Social Studies (LCSS)<br>School of Education, Indiana University-Bloomington<br>Centre for Gender in Global Context (GENCEN), Michigan State University<br>Department of Law, Gediz University<br><br>Call for Proposals<br>The abstract submission deadline has now been extended till Monday, 22nd<br>December 2014<br>The International Conference on Gender and Education aims to engage researchers,<br>academics and policy makers in discussions and debates concerning the interplay<br>between gender related issues and educational [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-16T16:08:47+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Gender and Education</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;7441b7df.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;f9afbb2.1411">   <title>Educational conference 2015 Romania </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;f9afbb2.1411</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>The Teacher Training Department, West University of Timi\ufffd\ufffdoara (Romania), is<br>pleased to announce the International Conference *Beliefs and Behaviours in<br>Education and Culture*, which<br>will be held in June 25 - 27, 2015.<br><br>The aim of the conference, proposing interdisciplinary perspectives, is to<br>build comprehensive and holistic explanations of beliefs from different<br>sciences that have a great impact upon education and culture. The<br>conference addresses themes related to issues and processes of education at<br>any level, from kindergarten to lifelong learning, from formal to informal<br>education. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-06T12:21:24+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>monica oprescu</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;f9afbb2.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;e95e2fa7.1407">   <title>Digital Preservation Awards 2-14 - 2nd call for nominations </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;e95e2fa7.1407</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>There is just one month remaining until the Digital Preservation Awards 2014 deadline for entries on 28th July 2014, and those wishing to gain recognition for their hard work in digital preservation are encouraged to enter now!<br><br>Created in 2004 to raise awareness about digital preservation, the Digital Preservation Awards are the most prominent celebration of achievement for those people and organisations that have made significant and innovative contributions to ensuring our digital memory is accessible tomorrow. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-01T09:40:18+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Sarah Middleton</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;e95e2fa7.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;c7755b38.1404">   <title>Speed reading course </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;c7755b38.1404</link>   <description> The Legentas.com Team is looking for people to test the English version of our speed reading application.<br>You will be provided with a free full license to the training course in exchange for some structured feedback.<br><br>Why join?<br>The Legentas speed reading course teaches how to read more characters in one fixation. After the lessons people can read up to twice as fast as before without losing comprehension. It makes the brain absorb information better and also helps readers predict what follows in the text to get to the core of it. This is an excellent way to train the [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-11T08:37:30+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Robin Van der Heyden</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=AFELG-DIS;c7755b38.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
